titleStmt.title: The true discription of this marueilous straunge fishe, whiche was taken on Thursday was sennight, the xvi. day of June, this present month, in the yeare of our Lord God. M.D.LX.ix
titleStmt.author: C. R., fl. 1569.

publicationStmt.publisher: In fleetstreate, beneathe the conduit, at the signe of Saint John Euangelist, by Thomas Colwell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
